an3.151:1.1: “When a foolish, incompetent untrue person has three qualities they keep themselves broken and damaged. …
an3.151:1.2: Blameworthy deeds by way of body, speech, and mind. …
an3.151:2.1: When an astute, competent true person has three qualities they keep themselves healthy and whole. …
an3.151:2.2: Blameless deeds by way of body, speech, and mind. …”
